title: March 9
description:
Felix had his six-year checkup a few months too late.
  • 55 1/4 lbs - 25kg
  • 47 1/4 inches - (1.2m) - almost 4 feet!

Felix is loving school. He really likes all of his many teachers and is interested in what they teach. Garden class, yoga and Mad Science are definitely his faves. His dexterity with things like scissors is shooting through the roof and his handwriting is excellent, especially compared to his non-French-school friends. Go Felix!

Milo's also growing. In particular, he's becoming more aware and considerate. His "sorrys" are more heartfelt, he's following rules better, and when we're correcting his behavior, he mostly actually listens, rather than trying to tra-la-la away.

Lucie's working too much -- got sucked into one too many projects -- and that's chafing against her French heritage and her mom genes.

Dean's working a lot and enjoying (almost) every minute of it. Apparently there's less friction with the American heritage and dad genes.

children.title: K&T Birthday
children.description:
It was a perfect day to celebrate Kora and Torin's birthdays in Tilden park.

left to right: Milo, Phoebe, Sarah, Owen, Felix.

children.title: Candy Carnage
children.description: Instead of the usual Berkeley organic carob cake, we just threw dripping fistfuls of hard candy at the kids.

children.title: Candimonium
children.description: The candy scheme just might have been architected by Kora & Torin's dad.  We suspect him to be deep in the pocket of Big Orthodontia.

children.title: Arrrr
children.description: The pirate chest is Milo's prize for staying in his own bed for a whole week.  He was getting steadily worse at slipping into our bed during the witching hour.  We're cautiously hopeful the worse is behind us!

children.title: Rudolph
children.description: One of Milo's favorite games right now is Christmas Eve.  He's Rudolph, Dean is Santa.  We deliver presents. Sometimes negligent parents leave their fireplaces lit, and Rudolph has to pee down the chimney to make the world safe for Christmas.

children.title: Spring
children.description: Nothing says 'Spring' like a nudist on a bean bag.
